Job Details  Description  Milliman, Inc. is recognized as one of the top firms providing professional services to the financial services industry. Milliman is seeking one or more Data Scientists to join our modelling team and help build data-driven tools that provide insight to clients investing in the mortgage market. The Data Scientist will join a growing team that maintains and develops algorithms to model borrower behavior.  Milliman is one of the leading experts evaluating mortgage collateral for government agencies, mortgage lenders, insurers, reinsurers, and investors. Role  The Data Scientist will support and/or lead initiatives primarily related to empirical model development, monitoring, maintenance, documentation, and governance of the models used in Milliman M-PIRe and consulting assignments. The Data Scientist will be responsible for designing and developing high quality modeling solutions from simple data analysis to deploying complex statistical techniques. All possible techniques should be researched and evaluated as part of the role.
